message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $175 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $200 is really the lowest I can go. It's a steal at that price!
